meanings.definition: A larval form of certain mollusks and other invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The veligers swam gracefully in the water, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the development of veligers to understand their life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The veligers decided to have a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: Watching the veligers move through the water was like witnessing a ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium displayed a tank full of veligers, showcasing their delicate beauty.
